data.name: RPG Maker MZ - P. KONEKO Monster Design Pack FV
data.detailed_description:
"P. KONEKO Monster Design Pack FV" is a collection of 37 types of front-view monster battlers drawn using grisaille painting techniques, giving it an emphasis on shadows and a strong sense of presence!
This is the perfect front-view material for those looking to create a somewhat retro western atmosphere but with an added hint of realism!

Other than standard color variances for some monsters, there is an additional “Arrangement” folder where you could find the Body, Shadow, and Effect in separate files. You are free to edit these and make them into your own unique variation for your game!

Another folder that contains the monster drawing’s Original Size (about 3x bigger than “Big Size”. For comparison, Big Size is 1.5x bigger than “Normal Size”) is also included. While the Original Size would be too big as a battler, there are excellent for use as dialogues window portraits or just for your own “recreational viewing”!

***************************
Pictures: 589 points (37 kinds of monsters)
・Arrangement: 286 items (including differential designs)
・Big_size : 48 points (including differential design)
・Normal_size : 48 points (including differential designs)
・Original_size : 207 points (including differential designs)
***************************
